custom_config.keys_hint.label.json: Separate keys with a period (example: key1.key2.key3)
custom_config.keys_hint.label.xml:
Keys are a simplified version of XPath.
Namespaces can be set explizitlcy via '{..}', and disabled with '{}'.
(Example: ./{http://example.com/some/namesapce}key1/key2)
